import axios from 'axios'; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { Button, Card, Col, Image, ListGroup, Row } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Rating from '../components/Rating'; import { listProductDetails } from "../actions/productActions"; function ProductScreen({ match }) { const [product, setProduct] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { async function fetchProduct() { const { data } = await axios.get(`/api/products/${match.params.id}/`) setProduct(data) } fetchProduct() }, [match.params.id]) return (
